data.name: Heartbound - OST
data.detailed_description:
This is the full soundtrack for Heartbound plus a number remixes, test songs, and otherwise unreleased tracks. Additional songs will be added to this pack as we release more chapters of the game.

As long as you are not directly reuploading the music with no other content you are free to use the songs in this OST in any videos or streams whether they are monetized or not.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/567380/
data.about_the_game:

http://store.steampowered.com/app/567380/
data.short_description: The original sound track for Heartbound.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is locked to 60 frames per second.
